item.title: Model Selection
item.description: Suppose we have a generating process that generates some numbers based on a distribution. Based on a data sample, we could reconstruct some sort of theoretical models to represent the actual generating process. Which is a Good Model? (1)The black curve represent the generating process. The red rectangle is a very simple model that captures some major samples. The blue step-wise model is capturing more sample data but with more parameters.
